category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_tnf_timeout_period
preference.preference_description: Defines the time (in seconds) allocated for Teamcenter server to generate Teamcenter Normal Form (TNF). If the TNF generation takes more than the specified value, the Teamcenter server will give up automatic TNF generation. Valid Values: * -1 : No time-out. This results in one TNF clause to be generated regardless how long it takes. * 0 : Immediate time-out. No TNF is ever generated. * Any positive value.
